1.  Preparing Data

1.2 Installing and loading the packages
Load the R packages into RStudion environment

```{r}
pacman::p_load(ggdist, ggridges, ggthemes,
colorspace, tidyverse)
```

1.3 Importing Data
```{r}
exam_data <- read_csv("Exam_data.csv")
```


2. Compare different graphs
2.1 By using box plot
```{r}
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(y = CLASS,       
           x= ENGLISH)) + 
  geom_boxplot()+
  theme(
    panel.border = element_rect(color = "lightblue", fill = NA, size = 3),
    panel.background = element_rect(fill = "white")
  )
  geom_boxplot()            
```
